Text: @mt_phile I tried hard to find it's video bitrate because it was MKV. But it was something around 3100.

If you are on Windows you can try MediaInfo

mediainfo.sourceforge(.)net
@mt_phile Thanks man, it worked. I'll use it for my future torrents.
BTW, after you finished downloading it, can you write how the quality was?

1920x1040, 25fps, 11.2Mbps
AC3, 6-Channels, 448Kpbs, 48KHz/16bits, headers stripped

8/10 Audio (it is just a bit quiet)
10/10 Video (stupidly good looking)

Thanks @rassouli5 !
